file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 27-36-05-04 - STALL PROTECTION PANEL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL STALL PROTECTION PANEL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Stall Protection Panel. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 27-36-05-000-801-A STALL PROTECTION PANEL - REMOVAL STALL PROTECTION PANEL - INSTALLA- ALL 27-36-05-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 27-36-05 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 27-36-05-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. STALL PROTECTION PANEL - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the Stall Protection Panel. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY To lock the elevator torque tube in the neu- GSE 058 Kit, Rig Pins tral position D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that the aircraft is safe for maintenance. (2) On the Overhead Circuit Breaker Panel, open the circuit breakers below and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to them. • CHANNEL 1 ( Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/ STALL PROT/ CHANNEL 1). • SHAKER 1 ( Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/ STALL PROT/ SHAKER 1). • CHANNEL 2 ( Location Tip: DC BUS 2/ STALL PROT/ CHANNEL 2). • SHAKER 2 ( Location Tip: DC BUS 2/ STALL PROT/ SHAKER 2). • PUSHER CLUTCH (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/ STALL PROT/ PUSHER CLUTCH). • (FOR AIRCRAFT WITH DUAL FMS INSTALLED) FMS 1 (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/NAV/FMS1) EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 27-36-05 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) On the right power control/distribution box, open the PUSHER MOTOR circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-TAG to it. I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Release the two Dzus fasteners (2) to remove the Stall Protection Panel (4). (2) Disconnect the electrical connector (3). (3) Remove the Stall Protection Panel (4) from the control pedestal (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 27-36-05 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Stall Protection Panel - Removal/Installation Figure 401 2. DZUS 4. STALL PROTECTION PANEL A 1. CONTROL PEDESTAL 3. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 2. DZUS 1 DET. A 4. STALL PROTECTION PANEL 3. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 2 DET. A 1 APPLICABLE TO AIRCRAFT WITH SINGLE FMS INSTALLED. 2 145AMM270055.MCE B APPLICABLE TO AIRCRAFT WITH DUAL FMS INSTALLED. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 27-36-05 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 27-36-05-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. STALL PROTECTION PANEL - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the Stall Protection Panel. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION STALL PROTECTION SYSTEM - OPERATIONAL AMM TASK 27-36-00-700-801-A/500 CHECK FLIGHT MANAGEMENT SYSTEM (FMS) - OPERA- AMM TASK 34-61-00-700-801-A/500 TIONAL TEST AMM TASK 34-62-00-700-801-A/500 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY GSE 058 Kit, Rig Pins To lock the aileron system in neutral position E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Connect the electrical connector (3) on the Stall Protection Panel (4). (2) Put the panel (4) in its housing in the control pedestal (1). (3) Tighten the two Dzus fasteners (2) of the Stall Protection Panel (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 27-36-05 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the Circuit Breaker Panel, close the circuit breakers below and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from them. • CHANNEL 1 ( Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/ STALL PROT/ CHANNEL 1). • SHAKER 1 ( Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/ STALL PROT/ SHAKER 1). • CHANNEL 2 ( Location Tip: DC BUS 2/ STALL PROT/ CHANNEL 2). • SHAKER 2 ( Location Tip: DC BUS 2/ STALL PROT/ SHAKER 2). • PUSHER CLUTCH (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/ STALL PROT/ PUSHER CLUTCH). • (FOR AIRCRAFT WITH DUAL FMS INSTALLED) FMS 1 (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/NAV/FMS1) (2) On the right power control/distribution box, close the PUSHER MOTOR circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-TAG from it. (3) Do the operational check of the Stall Protection System ( AMM TASK 27-36-00-700-801-A/500). (4) (For aircraft equipped with DUAL FMS Honeywell) Do the FMS Joystick test. Refer to AMM TASK 34-61-00-700-801-A/500 step 5. (5) (For aircraft equipped with DUAL FMS Universal) Do the FMS Joystick test. Refer to AMM TASK 34-62-00-700-801-A/500 step (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 27-36-05 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
